description: Two primitive humans excitedly celebrate a successful hunt next to a large pit trap. A massive piece of meat hangs from a tree branch over the pit, serving as bait. Inside the pit, however, only a very small animal is visible. Their exaggerated joy over this meager catch, juxtaposed with the scale of the trap and bait, creates an absurd and ironic situation.
caption: “Big one, Thag! ... We caught biiiiiig one!”
